monster.name: Avatar of Death
monster.hp: half the hit point maximum of its summoner
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned , unconscious
monster.languages: all languages known to its summoner

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
text: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Turning Immunity
text: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

trait.name: Hit Points
text: The Avatar of Death appears with hit points equal to half its summoner's maximum hit points.

action.name: Reaping Scythe
text: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
